item.title: OpenEars at StartUp
item.dc:creator: massinegro204
item.description:
hi, first of all I apologize for the question .. but are impractical to xcode

But I would like to ask a question:

I downloaded OpenEarsSampleApp and I noticed that recognition proceeds immediately when the application is running in the simulator. how can I do to stop this process at startup .thank you

item.title: Reply To: OpenEars at StartUp
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Hello,

I’m sorry, I can’t answer general Objective-C questions in this forum. You can research the viewDidLoad method of an iOS view controller to learn more about the structure of view controllers and app startup.

item.title: Reply To: OpenEars at StartUp
item.dc:creator: massinegro204
item.description: but it is possible that there is no one who can help me to block the automatic start up

item.title: Reply To: OpenEars at StartUp
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
It’s necessary to have some way of getting help with learning Objective-C outside of this forum. The best way would be to connect with a local group of developers. Based on your IP, here are some good resources to start with:

http://www.xcodeitalia.com/xcodeitalia/ipb/
http://cocoaheads.org/it/Carpi/index.html
